messages.subject: Re: unschoolers on Big Island WAS going to LIG
messages.msgSnippet: ~~ There is a family from the Big Island coming to the conference with teens. And the LiG conference diva, Mary Gold is not too, too far from you, in
messages.messageBody:
~~ There is a family from the Big Island coming to the conference
with teens. And the LiG conference diva, Mary Gold is not too, too far
from you, in Corvallis. She has two teens, herself. ~~

I'll have three of my four with me...Jared (15), Sierra (12..also an "honorary teen" for many years due to hanging with older brothers friends) and Jalen (8). I really wish Trevor (19) was coming, to talk about the whole transitioning thing. But he'll be there in spirit and I'll be talking about him.:)

Two of my sisters will be there with their children. Heidi has two teens as well so there will be plenty of older kids/teens etc...

Ren
radicalunschooling.blogspot.com

messages.subject: unschoolers on Big Island WAS going to LIG
messages.msgSnippet: There is a family from the Big Island coming to the conference with teens. And the LiG conference diva, Mary Gold is not too, too far from you, in Corvallis.
messages.messageBody:
There is a family from the Big Island coming to the conference

with teens. And the LiG conference diva, Mary Gold is not too, too far

from you, in Corvallis. She has two teens, herself.

*****
By the Big Island, you mean Hawaii, yes?  We won't be at Life is Good, but we will be on the Big Island in July, visiting family.  We'll be in Kona for 3 or 4 days, then 6 or 7 days in Hilo.  I'd love to be able to catch up with unschoolers during our visit.  Email me off-list, if you're on the Big Island.

Sylvia

www.ourhapahome.blogspot.com

www.mysquareone.blogspot.com

www.ourhapahome365.blogspot.com
